name: Huawei Honor 7
description: Huawei Honor 7 Android smartphone. Announced 2015, June. Features 3G, 5.2″ IPS-NEO LCD capacitive touchscreen, 20 MP camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth.

Body.SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

Platform.OS: Android OS, v5.0 (Lollipop), upgradable to v6.0 (Marshmallow)Android OS, v6.0 (Marshmallow) - Enhanced Edition
Platform.CPU: Quad-core 2.2 GHz Cortex-A53 & quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53

Memory.Card slot: microSD, up to 128 GB (uses SIM 2 slot)
Memory.Internal: 16/64 GB, 3 GB RAM32 GB, 3 GB RAM - Enhanced Edition

Camera.Primary: 20 MP, f/2.0, 27mm, phase detection autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) flash, check quality
Camera.Features: 1/2.4' sensor size, geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR, panorama

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, WiFi Direct, hotspot
Comms.GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS/ BDS (market dependant)

Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM
Others: Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
